name: 5.01 Check Set out/ Conformity with Drawings
– Datum point is marked in accessible area by Surveyor
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure pipe work is ready and client delivers pipe work to work zone
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
– As per minimum horizontal clearances in table 701.101
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
– no less than 100mm bedding via vibration plate
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
– Rebate and socket ends of pipe sections shall be placed facing upstream and be fully entered as per Vic Roads Sec701.12(b)
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
SPECIFICATION / STANDARD: Bedding and backfill materials shall be placed and compacted in layers not exceeding 150 mm loose thickness.
– Acceptance will be via compaction test ITP ref 5.07
– Backfill to be in 150mm loose layers.
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
STAGE / FREQUENCY: In reference to Vic Roads Acceptance of Field Compaction & Vic Roads 701 we are defining a “lot” at 50 lin mtrs, and 3 test per 50l/mtrs
RECORDS: Test report by Geotech advisor
SPECIFICATION / STANDARD: Vic Roads Acceptance of Field compaction RC500.05 June 2017 Code of practice 2.2 Selection of lot.
– Terra Firma test pass based on 95% STD
INSPECTION / TEST PROC: Terra Firma test results
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
5.08 Pipe bandages around external connection of pit to pit, and internal final patch of pipe to pit
RECORDS: Photos of external and internal pit walls
SPECIFICATION / STANDARD: Relevant authority construction details
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
STAGE / FREQUENCY: All drainage lines constructed shall be inspected, via CCTV for internal review of pipe
RECORDS: CCTV video to be submitted
SPECIFICATION / STANDARD: Vic Roads 701.24 Inspection of drainage lines beneath pavements
– Sign off after vision is viewed.
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
STAGE / FREQUENCY: As required to get accurate as built information, typically pit to pit post installation.
– Show line, grade and position of pipework and pits.
INSPECTOR / APPROVER: Contractor Authorised Representative, Subcontractor Authorised Representative, Engineer, Foreman
